name: The Little Witch
description:
Developed for MiniJam 73: Power where the limitation is only 5 colours.
This game is not finished and will recieve future updates/bug fixes.

THE LITTLE WITCH
This game is about a mischievous little girl that is the niece to many witch aunties. Whilst the aunties are out on business, the young girl 'Glindy' decides to play with the couldron. It doesn't take long before trouble brews and a big bang sets off inside the house. The light from outside dims and the couldron bubbles! Whooosh! 3 Glowing orbs shoot out of the couldron and out of the window as fast as the eyes can see. 

As Glindy looked out the window, she sheeked in despair. "She's done it again" lectured the talking cat, a pet of the family house hold. "Oh shuush lousy old bag, I just need to go out and get those orb thingies and Aunties wont know a thing.." - replied the confident little witch... and so she did just that, she set out on her little adventure, just like always.. fixing her silly mistakes.
 

Controls:
Movement: A/D or Controller Stick
Jump: Spacebar or A Button
Attack: Left Click or X Button
Dash: Right Click or B Button (Not fully working as intended)
Note: All controller testing was done with an old xbox controller. results my vary though I welcome feedback with your own controller.
